mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT FREE_BNO, FREE_TITLE, SUBSTR(FREE_CONTENT,1,40) AS FREE_CONTENT FROM FREE_BOARD WHERE FREE_BLINDSTATE=1 ORDER BY FREE_BNO DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 6

SELECT DISTINCT IB.INFO_BNO, IB.INFO_TITLE, SUBSTR(IB.INFO_CONTENT, 1, 40) AS INFO_CONTENT, IB.INFO_KEYWORD, F.INFO_FILE_UPLOAD FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT INFO_BNO, INFO_TITLE, INFO_CONTENT, INFO_KEYWORD FROM INFO_BOARD WHERE INFO_BLINDSTATE = 1 ORDER BY INFO_REGDATE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 6 ) IB LEFT JOIN INFO_FILE F ON IB.INFO_BNO = F.INFO_BNO ORDER BY IB.INFO_BNO DESC
